<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the text label of an existing marker.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> markerName '''setMarkerTextLocal''' text

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"Marker1" [[setMarkerTextLocal]] "You are here.";</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerBrush]], [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerDir]], [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerShape]], [[setMarkerSize]], [[setMarkerType]]
</value></part></template>
